events.name: Volunteers' Summit
events.short: Whether you’re a Fresher or a Charity Week Veteran, Volunteers' Summit is your first stop to find out everything about the campaign and how you can get involved!

events.name: Virtual Auction Dinner
events.short: The Auction Dinner perfectly captures the essence of CW! CW2020 may be unlike any dinner we’ve ever had before but you can still expect to enjoy all the much loved exciting auction bidding battles, competitions, prizes, speeches and CW farewells!

events.name: Speakers
events.short: From inspiring talks to engaging quizzes, the opportunities to educate and inform students across campus of CW, the History of Islam theme and other important topics are endless. We will be hosting multiple speaker events on important and interesting topics that will stay with you long after you have attended.

events.name: Collects
events.short: We think of Collects as the true spirit of Charity Week. From chanting the CW vision to rallying the spirits of volunteer collectors, we are planning to retain this much loved event by adding a virtual element

events.name: Education and Outreach
events.short: CW is the perfect opportunity to help those in need, but we also want to provide disadvantaged A-level students across London and the UK a chance to get some guidance and support with their university applications.

events.name: Championships
events.short: At the heart of every mighty campaign is a challenge - one that tests its volunteers and helps forge unbreakable bonds of friendship. Check out the challenges we will try to conquer!
